text:
e="preserve">Pedro Manuel Barata de Macedo Lima (20 April 1971 – 20 June 2020) was a Portuguese-Angolan actor and swimmer. He was best known for appearing in telenovelas in Portugal. He was also an Olympic swimmer and participated in the 1988 and 1992 Olympic games. He starred as "Ilha dos Amores" and "Second Life". Lima was born in Luanda, Portuguese Angola.
Lima died on 20 June 2020 Cascais, Portugal at the age of 49. His death is believed to be a suicide.
